entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
